mapper.select: SELECT A.TICKET_NO, A.ORDER_ID, A.ORDER_NO, A.CUST_ID, A.CUST_NAME, A.CNTC_ID, A.REQST_DT, A.OLD_HP_NO, A.OLD_HOME_NO, A.OLD_OFFICE_NO, A.OLD_EMAIL, CASE WHEN (A.NEW_HP_NO = A.OLD_HP_NO OR A.NEW_HP_NO IS NULL) THEN 'Remain Unchange' ELSE A.NEW_HP_NO END AS NEW_HP_NO, CASE WHEN (A.NEW_HOME_NO = A.OLD_HOME_NO OR A.NEW_HOME_NO IS NULL) THEN 'Remain Unchange' ELSE A.NEW_HOME_NO END AS NEW_HOME_NO, CASE WHEN (A.NEW_OFFICE_NO = A.OLD_OFFICE_NO OR A.NEW_OFFICE_NO IS NULL) THEN 'Remain Unchange' ELSE A.NEW_OFFICE_NO END AS NEW_OFFICE_NO, CASE WHEN (A.NEW_EMAIL = A.OLD_EMAIL OR A.NEW_EMAIL IS NULL) THEN 'Remain Unchange' ELSE A.NEW_EMAIL END AS NEW_EMAIL, A.STATUS STATUS_CODE, A.CNTC_ID FROM SAL0329D A WHERE A.TICKET_NO = #{ticketNo}
